topic: 2026 actor award nominations: see the full list of nominees

text: The wait is finally over, and the nominations for the 2026 actor awards are out
Some of the biggest names in the industry made the cut, but the top prize winners are still uncertain
The nominees for Best Actor include a range of talented performers
John Smith, Michael Johnson, and David Lee received nods for their outstanding work
Their work in film and television over the past year was recognized
The Best Actress category is highly competitive
Emily Chen, Sarah Taylor, and Olivia Brown were nominated for their powerful performances
They played a variety of roles, from drama to comedy
The full list of nominees includes twenty actors and actresses
Their achievements in film, television, and theater were recognized
The list can be found on the official awards website
As the awards ceremony approaches, fans are left wondering who will win
Industry insiders are also speculating about potential upsets and dark horse winners
The outcome is still uncertain, leaving everyone in anticipation
